mapper.select: select * from (select ss.stockname, week.*, trunc((week.mon_r_open + week.tue_r_open + week.wed_r_open + week.thu_r_open + week.fri_r_open)/5) as average from (select mon.*, tue.tue_r_open, wed.wed_r_open, thu.thu_r_open, fri.fri_r_open from (select stockcode, trunc(avg(r_open)) as mon_r_open from stock_recode where stockcode in (select stockcode from stock_stock where stocktheme =#{theme}) and to_char(r_date, 'day') = '월요일' group by stockcode) mon join (select stockcode, trunc(avg(r_open)) as tue_r_open from stock_recode where stockcode in (select stockcode from stock_stock where stocktheme =#{theme}) and to_char(r_date, 'day') = '화요일' group by stockcode) tue on mon.stockcode = tue.stockcode join (select stockcode, trunc(avg(r_open)) as wed_r_open from stock_recode where stockcode in (select stockcode from stock_stock where stocktheme =#{theme}) and to_char(r_date, 'day') = '수요일' group by stockcode) wed on tue.stockcode = wed.stockcode join (select stockcode, trunc(avg(r_open)) as thu_r_open from stock_recode where stockcode in (select stockcode from stock_stock where stocktheme =#{theme}) and to_char(r_date, 'day') = '목요일' group by stockcode) thu on wed.stockcode = thu.stockcode join (select stockcode, trunc(avg(r_open)) as fri_r_open from stock_recode where stockcode in (select stockcode from stock_stock where stocktheme =#{theme}) and to_char(r_date, 'day') = '금요일' group by stockcode) fri on thu.stockcode = fri.stockcode) week JOIN stock_stock ss ON week.stockcode = ss.stockcode order by average desc) where rownum < 6
